Name: Primitive Road
About the game: Primitive Road is an indie VR shooting game with minimalist design, arcade elements and beautiful graphics. Go through the 9 levels, blow up the pyramids and objects in your path and reach the final. Features 9 different levels to explore Fantasy music for each level Various graphic styles HMD controlling method Fragmented objects
